title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 400 - All Facilities-General Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 400 - All Facilities-General Requirements

State Regulations
§ 400.1 - Title and applicability
§ 400.2 - Other laws, codes, rules and regulations
§ 400.3 - Inspection, reproduction and reports
§ 400.4 - Contracts
§ 400.5 - Statements or bills for health services
§ 400.6 - Identification of personnel delivering health care services
§ 400.7 - Facility participation in title XVIII program
§ 400.8 - Exception, construction standards
§ 400.9 - Transfer and affiliation agreements
§ 400.10 - Health provider network access and reporting requirements
§ 400.11 - Assessment of long-term care patients
§ 400.12 - Level of care criteria

§ 400.14 - Request for patient review instrument (PRI) data
§ 400.15 - The role of the licensed practical nurse in intravenous therapy procedures
§ 400.16 - Determination of death
§ 400.17 - Compliance with application conditions
§ 400.18 - Statewide Planning and Research Cooperative System (SPARCS)
§ 400.19 - Withdrawal of equity or assets
§ 400.20 - HIV infection control
§ 400.21 - Advance directives
§ 400.22 - Statewide perinatal data system
§ 400.23 - [Repealed]
§ 400.24 - Charges in connection with certain health care facility financings
§ 400.25 - Disclosure of nursing quality indicators
§ 400.26 - Health Equity Impact Assessments

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 400

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 206[1], 2500, 2800, 2803, 2805-j, 2805-m, 2812, 3600, 3612, 4010; Social Services Law, §§363-a, 366-g

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
